CompanyDescription: Unless we state otherwise or the context otherwise requires, the terms "Heska," "we," "our," "us" and the "Company" refer to Heska Corporation and its consolidated subsidiaries. Our Certificate of Incorporation, as amended (the "Charter"), authorizes three classes of stock: Original Common Stock, Public Common Stock, and Preferred Stock. Pursuant to an NOL Protective Amendment to the Charter adopted in 2010, all shares of Original Common Stock then outstanding were automatically -1- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- reclassified into shares of Public Common Stock. Our Public Common Stock trades on the Nasdaq Stock Market LLC. In this Annual Report on Form 10-K, references to "Public Common Stock" and "common stock" are references to our Public Common Stock, unless the context otherwise requires.
